title: help no support for me???
body: hi, all my topics in the support web are closed automatic without reply, i try to report the support member that do that but he is the only one that support me, please help

replies.body:
Hey Tadao Yokoshima,

Do you have ticket numbers to provide that were closed? I can try to get some insight into what's going on, perhaps.
this happen with all my request, all are redirect to that closed request, regardless of the subject

Heya
Could you please be a little bit more precise about what exactly is happening? What is the ticket you try to send about, and what exactly happens? 

Regards Rkoturdo
que solo una persona me atiende mis quejas en soporte y siempre las cierra en automatico y no me llega el mensaje a mi correo de que  a cerrado mis quejas, todo lo que mando lo cierra
I need report that support member and a new one
No idea what in the hell you are saying.
